name: Fall 2021 Creator's Challenge - Punkin Chunkin
description:
Grab a pumpkin and use the old tree slingshot to knock down some gravestones in this WebXR experience.

Experience it at this URL:

https://whirledelic.com/WebXR_Fall2021/

This was created for the AR/VR Creator's Meetup group Fall Challenge, to make some kind of AR or VR experience during the month of October. I wanted to see if I could create an interactive piece using WebXR instead of my usual Oculus API stuff, it works, BUT I cannot get WebXR running in any browsers other than Firefox on PC.

All assets were created in Blender (except sky-maps and sound effects which are from AllSkies pack and Calofo Monster Sounds pack respectively.
